title: Pearl Embellished Floral Haar with Aqua and Coral Accents
materials: 22K Gold (BIS Hallmarked). Features lustrous South Sea Pearls (Moti)
and vibrant Coral beads. Enhanced with shimmering Diamond Polki.
features: A modern take on the traditional Haaram, featuring a stunning floral pendant centerpiece intricately embellished with pearls and delicate diamond Polki setting. The necklace strand showcases a unique pattern of alternating pearls, corals, and aqua beads, creating a vibrant and captivating design. The lower portion features a jhumka-inspired dangle, adding a touch of traditional South Indian charm.
colors: Predominantly gold with the creamy white of the pearls
the blue of the aqua gemstones
and the orange hue of the corals create a captivating contrast. The diamond Polki adds a touch of sparkle and elegance.
occasions: and modern celebrations. A statement piece that complements both traditional attire like sarees and lehengas
description: A unique fusion of traditional South Indian design and contemporary aesthetics. The high-quality South Sea Pearls and vibrant gemstones are meticulously set in 22K gold, ensuring lasting beauty and value. This piece is a perfect blend of heritage and modern style, making it a treasured addition to any jewelry collection.
